This app may collect these data types: Financial info, App info and performance, and Device or other IDs

Purchase history: Analytics, Advertising or marketing, Fraud prevention, security, and compliance

Crash logs: Analytics, Developer communications, Advertising or marketing, Fraud prevention, security, and compliance
Diagnostics: Analytics, Developer communications, Fraud prevention, security, and compliance
Other app performance data: Analytics, Developer communications, Fraud prevention, security, and compliance

Device or other IDs: App functionality, Analytics, Developer communications, Advertising or marketing, Fraud prevention, security, and compliance, Account management
